title: F. Scott Fitzgerald and 'the Last of the Belles'

sources.title: F. Scott Fitzgerald and 'The Last of the Belles'
sources.description: A semi-fictional account of how writer F. Scott Fitzgerald met his wife while he was in the army and stationed in Alabama in 1919. - IMDB Description
